db:article.db:para: Qt Insight is an analytics solution designed to provide real customer insights on the usage of your application or device. It was created for companies utilizing embedded technology to shed light on an applicationâ€™s performance, usage, and user data that may not be otherwise attainable.
Qt Insight Tracker provides C++ and QML APIs to track application usage through events and send the analytic data to a Qt Insight back-end server.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.
To import the QML types into your application, use the following import statement in your .qml file:

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS InsightTracker) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt::InsightTracker)
db:section.db:para: See also the Build with CMake overview.

db:section.db:title: Building with qmake
db:section.db:para: To configure the module for building with qmake, add the module as a value of the QT variable in the project's .pro file:

db:section.db:title: Overview
db:section.db:para: For a more detailed overview of Qt Insight Tracker, see Qt Insight Tracker Overview.

db:section.db:title: Licenses
db:section.db:para: Qt Insight Tracker is available under commercial licenses from The Qt Company. See Qt Licensing for further details.

db:section.db:title: Technology Preview
db:section.db:para: Qt Insight Tracker is a technology preview. There are no source or binary compatibility guarantees, as APIs may change based on user feedback and general improvements.
